content: the i 5 25 mm hook makes a ladies sized hat and smaller men s sized hat the j 6 mm hook creates a large men s hat i crochet fairly tight so use the hook you feel is appropriate for your gauge my gauge with an i hook is 2 inches = 7 stitches and 5 row gauge with a j hook is 2 inches = 6 stitches and 4 5 row use any worsted weight medium yarn to crochet this pattern either hook should use less than 3 5 ounces of yarn
